thread.title: Here's how you can watch Dodgers-Mets Game 4
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch Dodgers-Mets Game 4 | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Here's how you can watch Dodgers-Mets Game 4
text:
The National League Division Series between the Los Angeles Dodgers and the New York Mets continues today with Game 4 at Citi Field in Flushing, New York.
The Mets lead the series 2-1 after a 13-7 Game 3 win over the Dodgers on Monday.
Here's what you need to know to catch the game.
Time: 5:07 p.m. PDT
TV: TBS (DirecTV 247, Cox 7, Century Link 113, Dish 139)
Online: MLB.com (subscription required)
Game 5 (if necessary): Mets at Dodgers — Thursday, Oct. 15, 5:07 p.m. — TBS
Chase Utley's appeal of 2... Texas governor prematurely...
